fields.name: PBO
fields.description: Physical buffer offset. Offset of the physical buffer.

fields.name: PBBA
fields.description: Physical buffer base address. Base address MSB of the physical buffer.

fields.name: FF
fields.description: Force flush. When set, the cache entries are flushed. This bit is reset by hardware when the flushing is complete. Write 0 has no effect.

fields.name: FI
fields.description: Force invalidate. When set, the cache entries are invalidated. This bit is reset by hardware when the invalidation is complete. Write 0 has no effect.

fields.name: BOIE
fields.description: Buffer overflow interrupt enable. This bit enables the buffer 0 overflow interrupt.

fields.name: AMEIE
fields.description: AHB master error interrupt enable. This bit enables the AHB master error interrupt.

fields.name: BM
fields.description: 192 Block mode. This bit defines the number of blocks per line.

fields.name: CE
fields.description: Cache enable. This bit enables the cache unit.

fields.name: CL
fields.description: Cache lock. This bit lock the cache onto the buffer defined in the CLB field.

fields.name: CLB
fields.description: Cache lock buffer. This field select the buffer on which the cache is locked.

fields.name: FC
fields.description: Force caching. This bit force the caching into the cache regardless of the MPU attributes.  The cache must be enable (CE bit set).

fields.name: PD
fields.description: Prefetch disable. This bit disables the prefetch of the cache.

fields.name: OC
fields.description: Outter cachability. This bit configure the cachability of an access generated by the GFXMMU cache.

fields.name: OB
fields.description: Outter bufferability. This bit configure the bufferability of an access generated by the GFXMMU cache.

fields.name: DV
fields.description: Default value. This field indicates the default 32-bit value which is returned when a master accesses a virtual memory location not physically mapped.

fields.name: CBOF
fields.description: Clear buffer overflow flag. Writing 1 clears the buffer 0 overflow flag in the GFXMMU_SR register.

fields.name: CAMEF
fields.description: Clear AHB master error flag. Writing 1 clears the AHB master error flag in the GFXMMU_SR register.

fields.name: LO
fields.description: Line offset. Line offset of line number x (i.e. offset of block 0 of line x).

fields.name: EN
fields.description: Line enable.

fields.name: FVB
fields.description: First Valid Block. Number of the first valid block of line number x.

fields.name: LVB
fields.description: Last Valid Block. Number of the last valid block of line number X.

fields.name: BOF
fields.description: Buffer overflow flag. This bit is set when an overflow occurs during the offset calculation of the buffer 0. It is cleared by writing 1 to CB0OF.

fields.name: AMEF
fields.description: AHB master error flag. This bit is set when an AHB error happens during a transaction. It is cleared by writing 1 to CAMEF.
